home.title: Nothing But The Truth
home.description: A fun game to get to know each other better

common.welcome: Welcome to Nothing But The Truth

game.clickToStart: Click the circle to start the game
game.clickToStartWithoutPlayers: Add players and click the circle to start the game

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: Add players to the game by entering their names
Click the circle to start spinning
When the circle stops, the selected player must answer the question truthfully
If a player doesn't want to answer, they can skip the question
The game continues until all players have answered questions

rules.title: Rules
items: Each player can only be selected once until all players have had a turn
Questions won't repeat until all questions have been used
Players can skip questions they're uncomfortable with
There are no winners or losers - it's all about getting to know each other better!

resetProgress.title: Reset Progress
resetProgress.description: Resets the current game progress while keeping all players. This will:
items: Clear the current player and question
Reset the list of answered players

tips.title: Tips
items: Create a comfortable and safe environment for sharing
Respect each other's boundaries and privacy
Be supportive and non-judgmental of others' answers
Feel free to elaborate on your answers to make the game more engaging
